definition: do not worry about scarcity, but rather about uneven distribution (idiom, from Analects)
pinyin: bu4 huan4 gua3 er2 huan4 bu4 jun1

sentences.english: On ultrasound, Wilms' appears as a large, heterogeneous mass of the kidney.
sentences.chinese: 表現爲腎臟體積巨大不均質回聲腫物。

sentences.english: Large - scale bubbling or heterogeneity is not observed under normal conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在正常情況下觀察不到大規模的鼓泡或不均一性。

sentences.english: The distribution of myo- sleeve was uneven at different areas of the same circumference.
sentences.chinese: 在腔靜脈同一周徑上的不同區域肌袖分佈不均一。

sentences.english: There are also clues to indicate that plastids of pollen plant leaves may be heterogeneous.
sentences.chinese: 花粉植株細胞中的質體可能是不均一的。

sentences.english: The planetesimals accretions of the Earth obviously have two stages, including initial accretion and late accretion.
sentences.chinese: 這種不均一性起源於前地球階段堆積星子的不均一性。

sentences.english: The planetesimals accretions of the Earth obviously have two stages, including initial accretion and late accretion.
sentences.chinese: 這種不均一性起源於前地球階段堆積星子的不均一性。

sentences.english: On one side , it can avoid wet cloth imbalance which make the product of good-denisty and high quality.
sentences.chinese: 避免溼料布料不均現象，產品密實度好，質量高。

sentences.english: The alcohol of excessive can promote haemal circulation, make your color of skin red white not all.
sentences.chinese: 過量的酒精會促進血液循環，使你膚色紅白不均。

sentences.english: Saddle heights can be uneven, requiring regrinding or shimming .
sentences.chinese: 弦鞍高低不均，有個體差異，還需要重新打磨或墊高。

sentences.english: It is indicated that the chemical heterogeneity of the Earth restricts on the distribution of super-large ore deposit.
sentences.chinese: 最後指出地球化學不均一性對超大型礦牀分佈的制約。

sentences.english: However, color irregularities may still be observed on certain types of TV sets.
sentences.chinese: 但某些型式的電視機仍可能發生彩色不均的問題。

sentences.english: Non-uniform wall thickness is the biggest trouble maker in plastic injection molding.
sentences.chinese: 壁厚不均是注塑成型中最大的麻煩製造者。

sentences.english: Do the spoils need to be so unevenly split?
sentences.chinese: 戰利品有必要被如此不均地分割嗎？

sentences.english: This demonstrates a significant inhomogeneity of stress in diamond films.
sentences.chinese: 這說明了在金剛石膜中存在明顯的應力不均。

sentences.english: I think the inequality in splitting the profits is their real bone of contention.
sentences.chinese: 我想，分利不均纔是爭吵的真正原因。

sentences.english: Discuss trends in American wage inequality and the causes of these trends.
sentences.chinese: 試論美國薪酬不均之趨勢，以及這些趨勢的起因。

definition: to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
to favor one and discriminate against the other (abbr. for 厚此薄彼[hou4 ci3 bo2 bi3])
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
